title: Mick Cronin, Jay Glazer, and the Grit Week 19 Finale
description:
Grit Week 19 comes to a close and the Bucks are officially cursed by Aaron Rodgers lack of chugging ability.Â  Drake is being Drake and we recap the week out in LA. (2:45-18:03) Fyre Fest Of The Week. (18:04-29:04) UCLA Head Coach Mick Cronin joins us to talk about grit, his decision to take the job, how he'll miss fighting Xavier and how he's actually a football guy trapped in a basketball coach's body. (30:31-55:40) Jay Glazer joins the show from his gym and we talk grit and justice for his Odell scoop. (57:15-1:22:23) Segments include Danny kennel asks a question and we play unreal audio of a guy addicted to weed. (1:22:59-1:29:31) Sabermetrics (1:32:13-1:35:01) and FAQ's with sound guy Charles (1:35:02-1:40:08)


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
